title: Solr Index getting replaced
description:
Hello Team,

I have installed solr in my local and tried connecting with teradata.
Able to index data for single entity but when in same schema I am keep 2 entities and doing index one by one respectively
Here 2nd index data is replacing first index data.I want to merge data instead of replacing.
Can you please help

comments.content:
Hi Harhal,

Please ask such questions on the user mailing list : http://lucene.apache.org/solr/community.html#mailing-lists-irc

Jira's are only meant for filing bugs
comments.author: Varun Thacker
